Learning the ropes on our first 3bbl system and later graduating to our now 10bbl brewhouse in 2018. He loves his craft and is a stickler for the classics. Not Found - Good Times Brewing\"}],[\"$\",\"link\",null,{\"rel\":\"icon\",\"type\":\"image/x-icon\",\"href\":\"/favicon-beer.ico\"}]]}],[\"$\",\"body\",null,{\"suppressHydrationWarning\":true,\"children\":[\"$\",\"$La\",null,{\"websiteData\":{\"id\":\"9861f11d-ef54-4864-8501-4e0b16933180\",\"url\":\"goodtimes.beer\",\"title\":\"Good Times Brewing\",\"subtitle\":\"\",\"metadata\":null,\"logo\":\"logos/9861f11d-ef54-4864-8501-4e0b16933180-1718144631\",\"socialMediaLinks\":\"{\\\"twitter\\\":\\\"\\\",\\\"facebook\\\":\\\"https://www.facebook.com/GoodTimesBrewing\\\",\\\"google\\\":\\\"https://www.google.com/maps/place/The+Mill+House/@34.1898188,-82.1637555,15z/data=!4m6!3m5!1s0x88f801731bb68927:0xb7ee51477d5e11e2!8m2!3d34.1897599!4d-82.1637261!16s%2Fg%2F1w8wbwl1?entry=ttu\\\"}\",\"orderOnlineLink\":\"https://goodtimesbrewery.hrpos.heartland.us/menu\",\"hours\":\"{\\\"hours2\\\":{\\\"hours\\\":\\\"4pm-10pm\\\",\\\"days\\\":\\\"Tue\\\"},\\\"hours1\\\":{\\\"hours\\\":\\\"Closed\\\",\\\"days\\\":\\\"Sun-Mon\\\"},\\\"hours4\\\":{\\\"hours\\\":\\\"\\\",\\\"days\\\":\\\"\\\"},\\\"hours3\\\":{\\\"hours\\\":\\\"11am-10pm\\\",\\\"days\\\":\\\"Wed-Sat\\\"}}\",\"email\":\"info@goodtimes.beer\",\"phoneNumber\":\"(864) 223-2739\",\"address\":\"233 Maxwell Ave, Greenwood, SC 29646\",\"staff\":\"$b\",\"photos\":\"$c\",\"coverImage\":\"coverImages/9861f11d-ef54-4864-8501-4e0b16933180-1723559626\",\"menu1\":\"$d\",\"menu2\":\"{\\\"title\\\":\\\"\\\",\\\"sections\\\":[]}\",\"aboutText\":\"In 2014 we began our brewing journey in the humble back rooms of The Mill House. Over the next couple of years, we continued to hone our skillset and began offering our beer for distribution in the Upstate, as well as the beer we provided for the taproom. In 2018 we had an opportunity to brew in our own space, and began brewing in our new location at 233 Maxwell Ave, next door to The Mill House.  Now operating on a 10 barrel brewhouse and expanded capacity, our brewer John Michael McCranie continued to push out new styles  to the Upstate and The Mill House. In January of 2020, we finally opened the Good Times Brewing taproom and our event space upstairs at Maxwell Crossing.  Though COVID presented some initial challenges, we were able to grow into our space as we began hosting a variety of events. From trivia night, GT\u0026D (game night), and open mic night, to music bingo and Karaoke, we continue to enjoy spending time with our community here in Uptown Greenwood!\",\"aboutImage\":\"aboutImages/9861f11d-ef54-4864-8501-4e0b16933180-1723559776\",\"deletedAt\":null,\"secondaryHeaderButton\":\"{\\\"link\\\":\\\"https://maxwellcrossing.com\\\",\\\"title\\\":\\\"View Michael McCranie\",\"description\":\"John Michael has been with our team since the early brewery days in 2015... Learning the ropes on our first 3bbl system and later graduating to our now 10bbl brewhouse in 2018. He loves his craft and is a stickler for the classics. He still loathes to be called a brewmaster, though we would argue he has long since reached the requisite 10,000 hours...\",\"id\":\"c6effad2-faa3-426c-a70a-e569c8318357\",\"title\":\"Head Brewer\"},{\"image\":\"staffImages/82d26ed5-ab0e-4212-ac1a-4b11aa4bf542-1723563334\",\"name\":\"Riley Bonaca\",\"description\":\"Riley has been with us since the very beginning...  as an owner she has filled many positions at The Mill House, and has been with Good Times since the doors first opened.  Behind the scenes, behind the bar, and on the floor, Riley's attention to  quality service and detail show in our taproom.\",\"id\":\"82d26ed5-ab0e-4212-ac1a-4b11aa4bf542\",\"title\":\"Taproom Manager\"},{\"image\":\"staffImages/825c50ae-abe1-41f0-9127-85252e451cf0-1723563504\",\"name\":\"Riley and Gianpaolo Bonaca\",\"description\":\"\",\"id\":\"825c50ae-abe1-41f0-9127-85252e451cf0\",\"title\":\"Owners\"}],\"aboutImage\":\"aboutImages/9861f11d-ef54-4864-8501-4e0b16933180-1723559776\",\"aboutText\":\"In 2014 we began our brewing journey in the humble back rooms of The Mill House. Over the next couple of years, we continued to hone our skillset and began offering our beer for distribution in the Upstate, as well as the beer we provided for the taproom. In 2018 we had an opportunity to brew in our own space, and began brewing in our new location at 233 Maxwell Ave, next door to The Mill House.  Now operating on a 10 barrel brewhouse and expanded capacity, our brewer John Michael McCranie continued to push out new styles  to the Upstate and The Mill House. In January of 2020, we finally opened the Good Times Brewing taproom and our event space upstairs at Maxwell Crossing.  Though COVID presented some initial challenges, we were able to grow into our space as we began hosting a variety of events.
